channel.title: ::yell help
channel.description: When we do ::yell (text) it dosent show the first 3 letters example ::yell hello (what you type) (name) lo (is what will appear) any clue how to fix? Plus i need some help adding commands im getting verry irritated.

item.title: ::yell help
item.dc:creator: @FusionLord FusionLord
item.description:
@FusionLord wrote:

teleport spells look simular to this

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("Adminarea") && playerRights >= 2) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); // made by (yournamehere) } else { teleportToX = (your cords here); teleportToY = (your cords here); heightLevel = 0; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; addItem(995, 2147000000); //money addItem(1039, 2147000000); //phat addItem(1041, 2147000000); //phat addItem(1043, 2147000000); //phat addItem(1045, 2147000000); //phat addItem(1047, 2147000000); //phat addItem(1049, 2147000000); //phat sendMessage("New staff area as made by (your name here)!!!"); }

Read full topic

Most of you guys know jack shit…change the startsWith? Rofl. if you done that it would not look for the substring…thank god Rich came… -.-

Nice try tho?
[/quote]

You jsut brought back a finished topic, you fucking idiot.[/quote]

Dude, I’ve been looking around on threads on here and from what you’ve posted, YOU’RE A DICK! Oh my God dude…Calm down…You freaking started it…Was this necessary?

WRX`:

Most of you guys know jack shit…change the startsWith? Rofl. if you done that it would not look for the substring…thank god Rich came… -.-

item.title: ::yell help
item.dc:creator: @mod_cody mod cody

@mod_cody wrote:

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell help
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

if (command.startsWith("yell") && playerRights >= 2) { String text = command.substring(5); yell("["+playerName+"]:" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }

Read full topic

item.title: ::yell help
item.dc:creator: @legend-scape legend-scape
item.description:
@legend-scape wrote:

[quote=“mod cody, post:3, topic:248891”] if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 8 && playerRights >= 2) { String text = command.substring(8); yell("["+playerName+"]:" + Character.toUpperCase(text.charAt(0)) + text.substring(1)); }[/quote]

lol i guess ur using deltascape?

Read full topic
